meanings.definition: A large irregular spot or area of discoloration on the skin.
meanings.sent1: She had red blotches on her cheeks from the sunburn.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the blotches on the patient's arm.
meanings.sent3: The clown's face paint created colorful blotches that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The city lights formed a constellation of blotches in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting was ruined by unexpected blotches of paint.

meanings.definition: A mark or stain that spoils the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The coffee spill left blotches on the white tablecloth.
meanings.sent2: The ink blotches on the document made it hard to read.
meanings.sent3: The muddy paw prints left blotches all over the clean floor.
meanings.sent4: Her tears left blotches on the letter, smudging the ink.
meanings.sent5: The blotches of mold on the bread made it inedible.
